        public boolean isShipDropValid(Ship ship)
        Checks if a ship drop is valid. Verifies if all coords of the ship and the surrounding coords of were it's trying to place the ship are empty.
        Parameters:
        ship - The ship that's trying to place.
        Returns:
        true if valid. False otherwise.

        public boolean dropShip(Coords initCoord,
                        java.lang.String shipName,
                        java.lang.String direction)
        Tries to drop ship. Verifies if all coords of the ship and the surrounding coords of were it's trying to place the ship are empty.
        Parameters:
        initCoord - The init coords of the ship that it's trying to drop.
        shipName - The name of the ship that it's trying to drop.
        direction - The direction of the ship that it's trying to drop.
        Returns:
        true if dropped. False otherwise.
